          <title>
            <string language="de">Calvinismus</string>
            <string language="en">Calvinism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calvinism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calvinism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calvinism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Calvinism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calvinism</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Zusammenstellung wichtiger Punkte der Lehre des Calvinismus, der entsprechenden Struktur der Kirche sowie der wichtigsten Werke Calvins.<br>Fragen zum Text, weiterführende Fragen, Anregung zum Rollenspiel.</string>
            <string language="en">Listing of important points of the doctrine of Calvinism, the adequate structure of the church as well as the most significant works of Calvin. Questions on the text, further questions, invitation to role play</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Christentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Weltreligion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Calvin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Calvinismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Christianity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">World religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Calvin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Calvinismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liste des points importants de la doctrine de 
Calvinism, la structure adéquate de l'église aussi bien que les 
travaux les plus significatifs de Calvin. Questions sur le 
texte, d'autres questions, invitation au jeu de rôle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lista de pontos importantes da doutrina de 
Calvinism, a estrutura adequada da igreja as.well.as os trabalhos os 
mais significativos de Calvin. Perguntas no texto, perguntas 
mais adicionais, invitation ao jogo do papel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elenco dei punti importanti della dottrina di 
Calvinism, la struttura sufficiente della chiesa così come gli 
impianti più significativi di Calvin. Domande sul testo, 
ulteriori domande, invito al gioco di ruolo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λίστα των σημαντικών σημείων του δόγματος 
Calvinism, της επαρκούς δομής της εκκλησίας καθώς επίσης και 
των σημαντικότερων εργασιών Calvin. Ερωτήσεις στο 
κείμενο, περαιτέρω ερωτήσεις, πρόσκληση στο παιχνίδι ρόλου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Listado de las puntas importantes de la doctrina 
de Calvinism, la estructura adecuada de la iglesia así como los 
trabajos más significativos de Calvin. Preguntas sobre el 
texto, otras preguntas, invitación al juego del papel</string>
          </description>
